full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Multiple Victoria-Class Spares D1234337-23A**
======================================

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-464-5783802
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230745/A
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: April 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 1, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Project Overview**
----------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide multiple spare parts for the Victoria-Class vessels. The procurement involves the delivery of various components to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Required Items**
--------------------

The required items include:

* Cartridge, stop-check valve (Lot 1-2)
* Valve assembly, sole (Lot 3-4)
* Valve butterfly (Lot 5-6)
* Gage, differential dial indicating (Lot 7-8)
* Mount, resilient, utility (Lot 9-10)
* Parts kit, stop-check valve (Lot 11-12)
* Anti-flash device (Lot 13-14)
* Cartridge, check valve (Lot 15-16)

**Eligibility and Evaluation**
------------------------------

Eligible suppliers must be Canadian companies or businesses registered in the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS). Bidders must submit their proposal in the prescribed format, which can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Award Criteria**
-------------------

The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest price that meets the required specifications. Suppliers are encouraged to propose equivalent or substitute products.

**Language**
------------

All documents and communications related to this tender must be in either official language of Canada.

**Tender Documents**
----------------------

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and supporting attachments, can be found on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

**Contact**
------------

For more information, please contact:
Cassandra Leach
cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca
(999) 999-9999

**Trade Agreements**
---------------------

This procurement is restricted to Canadian companies eligible under the Canada-UKRAINE Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and other applicable free trade agreements.

**Regions of Delivery**
------------------------

The required items must be delivered to:
